item.title: Dollar Hits 2-Year High on Prospect of Cautious Fed
item.description: The dollarâ€™s momentum extended into 2025, amid expectations that the U.S. Federal Reserve will cut interest rates by less than other central banks.

item.title: Dow Industrials Rise to Start New Year
item.description: The Dow Jones Industrial Average led major indexes higher, with chip stocks also rising.

item.title: Gold Rises, Copper Flat as U.S. Dollar Rallies
item.description: Gold futures rose, beginning the new year on a positive note, as investors await fresh catalysts to decide the direction of precious metals.

item.title: U.S. Natural Gas Futures Start the Year With Gains
item.description: U.S. natural gas futures were higher, with the market looking to colder-than-usual temperatures for much of January to drive demand and reduce storage...

item.title: Treasury Yields Get Support From Lower-Than-Forecast Jobless Claims
item.description: Treasury yields pared losses after weekly jobless claims data showed layoffs in the U.S. remained subdued.
